name: nasty-plot
effect: Raises the user’s Special Attack by two stages.
short_effect: Raises the user’s Special Attack by two stages.

flavor_text.x_y: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. This sharply raises the user’s Sp. Atk.
